---
title: "Importing Raw data"
format: html
editor: visual
---

Download raw data

```{r}
library(here)
folder <- here('raw')

if (!dir.exists(folder)) {
  dir.create(folder, recursive = TRUE)
}
download.file('https://cbioportal-datahub.s3.amazonaws.com/tmb_mskcc_2018.tar.gz',file.path(folder,'raw_data.tar.gz'), mode = 'wb')
```
